translation: Derrote os inimigos que bloqueiam seu caminho!{#Name=" "}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name=" "}

translation: A mulher chamada Ákōru diz que{#Name="オクタ"}
source: あのアコールなる女が言うには{#Name="オクタ"}
いざとなったら食べさせるさ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Eu apostaria que Lady Três está se escondendo aqui.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I would wager Lady Three is hiding in here.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Ela sempre gostou de lugares escuros como este.{#Name="Octa"}
source: She always did enjoy dark places like this.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Isso, e essas ruínas são o único refúgio próximo.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: That, and these ruins are the only nearby refuge.{#Name="Decadus"}
Right. Let's give it a look.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Você não vai se aproximar de Lady Três!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: You're not getting near Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Oh ho ho! Tanta coragem tola!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! Such foolish courage!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Nossa missão é guardar Lady Três!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Our mission is to guard Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Então sugiro que você encontre outro ramo de trabalho!
source: Then I suggest you find another line of work!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: どかない！ スリイ様をお守りするのが我らの仕事だッ
source: どかない！　スリイ様をお守りするのが我らの仕事だッ{#Name="兵士F"}

translation: Então sugiro que você encontre outro ramo de trabalho!
source: Then I suggest you find another line of work!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Ughh! Estou ficando doente desses idiotas!
source: Ughh! I'm getting sick of these shitheads!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Só quero matar Três e acabar com isso!
source: I just wanna murder Three and get this over with!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Só quero matar Três e acabar com isso!
source: I just wanna murder Three and get this over with!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Mova ou morra! Não me importa qual!
source: Move or die! I don't care which!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Você está respirando muito pesadamente, minha senhora. A flor... hum...
source: You're breathing rather heavily,{LF}my lady. Is the flower...um...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Zero! Sinto o poder de uma canção! Posso sentir isso aqui em cima!
source: Zero! I feel a song's power! I can feel it up here!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No céu? Pensei que Três gostasse de lugares escuros.
source: In the sky? I thought Three liked dark places.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ela gosta, minha senhora, mas... Bem, hum...
source: She does, my lady, but... Well, um...{#Name="Octa"}
Stop them where they stand!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Glória à nossa bela Senhora Três!
source: Glory to our beautiful Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Vamos fazer isso e ir para casa!
source: Let's do this thing and go home!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Octa e Decadus estão com ela!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Octa and Decadus are with her!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Zero desonra o nome de Intoner!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Zero defiles the name of Intoner!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Vou matá-la! Vou matá-la AGORA!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: I'll kill her! I'll kill her NOW!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Não se humilhe diante de Lady Três!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Don't humiliate yourself before Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Que Lady Três nos proteja sempre!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: May Lady Three watch over us always!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Devemos servir nossa lady e matar esses monstros!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: We must serve our lady and kill these monsters!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Fique calmo! O pânico só vai te matar!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Stay calm! Panic will only get you killed!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Essa base será o túmulo deles!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: This base will be their grave!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Mas quando continuei a registrar a singularidade conhecida como Zero,{#Name="Accord"}
source: But as I continued to record the singularity known as Zero,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Comecei a me sentir preenchido com emoções muito estranhas…{#Name="Accord"}
source: I began to find myself filled with very strange emotions…{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Lá está ela! É Zero!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: There she is! It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Não deixe ela se aproximar de nossa amada Lady Três!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Don't let her near our beloved Lady Three!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Nossa, Três é muito popular, hein?{#Name="Zero"}
Indeed. She's been gaining fame even{LF}outside the Land of Forests for a while.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Indeed. She's been gaining fame even{LF}outside the Land of Forests for a while.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Especially for men who are...into those{LF}sorts of extracurricular activities...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Especially for men who are...into those{LF}sorts of extracurricular activities...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Again and again with these guys...{LF}Just get the hell out of my way already!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Again and again with these guys...{LF}Just get the hell out of my way already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: She enjoys high places as well, so...{#Name="Octa"}
source: She enjoys high places as well, so...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name=" "}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name=" "}
